recipes.name: Spaghetti
steps: Bring a pot of water to a boil and put the noodles in
Place beef into skillet and cook until brown
Drain the noodles and put into skillet with beef

recipes.name: Tacos
steps: Add taco seasoning and a splash of water; simmer

recipes.name: Chicken Stir Fry
steps: Saut√© garlic, then cook chicken until done
Add vegetables and cook until tender-crisp
Add soy sauce and toss; serve over rice
